name: We Miss You
description:
A game made between Christmas and New Years Eve for the Awful Holiday Jam 2018.

This is a very short, spook-less ghost story that takes place during the winter holiday season.

This game uses two asset store packs:

  1. Background Cars - MegaPack https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/background-cars-megapack-...
  2. VertexColorTrees - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vertex-color-trees-set-95968

Sound samples came from the free GDC sonniss.com sound packs, and one from freesound.org, specifically Zimbot who asked for credit if possible: https://freesound.org/people/zimbot/ for this sample: https://freesound.org/people/arseniiv/sounds/321513/. Thanks Zimbot!
